content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- $Id: zthes-1.0.rnc,v 1.3 2006/05/01 16:09:08 mike Exp $ --> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">   <xs:import namespace="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" schemaLocation="dc.xsd"/>   <xs:element name="Zthes">     <xs:complexType>       <xs:sequence>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="thes"/>         <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="term"/>       </xs:sequence>     </xs:complexType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="thes">     <xs:complexType>       <xs:sequence>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:title"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:creator"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:subject"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:description"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:publisher"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:contributor"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:date"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:type"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:format"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:identifier"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:source"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:language"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:relation"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:coverage"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="dc:rights"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="thesNote"/>       </xs:sequence>     </xs:complexType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="thesNote">     <xs:complexType mixed="true">       <xs:attribute name="label"/>       <xs:attribute name="vocab"/>     </xs:complexType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="term">     <xs:complexType>       <xs:sequence>         <xs:element ref="termId"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termUpdate"/>         <xs:element ref="termName"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termQualifier"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termType"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termLanguage"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termVocabulary"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="termCategory"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termStatus"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termApproval"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termSortkey"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="termNote"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termCreatedDate"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termCreatedBy"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termModifiedDate"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termModifiedBy"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="postings"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="relation"/>       </xs:sequence>     </xs:complexType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="termUpdate">     <xs:simpleType>       <xs:restriction base="xs:token">         <xs:enumeration value="add"/>         <xs:enumeration value="delete"/>       </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="termVocabulary" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="termCategory" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="termStatus">     <xs:simpleType>       <xs:restriction base="xs:token">         <xs:enumeration value="active"/>         <xs:enumeration value="deactivated"/>         <xs:enumeration value="deleted"/>       </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="termApproval">     <xs:simpleType>       <xs:restriction base="xs:token">         <xs:enumeration value="candidate"/>         <xs:enumeration value="approved"/>         <xs:enumeration value="rejected"/>       </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="termSortkey" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="termCreatedDate" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="termCreatedBy" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="termModifiedDate" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="termModifiedBy" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="termNote">     <xs:complexType mixed="true">       <xs:attribute name="label"/>       <xs:attribute name="vocab"/>     </xs:complexType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="postings">     <xs:complexType>       <xs:sequence>         <xs:element ref="sourceDb"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="fieldName"/>         <xs:element ref="hitCount"/>       </xs:sequence>     </xs:complexType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="fieldName" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="hitCount" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="relation">     <xs:complexType>       <xs:sequence>         <xs:element ref="relationType"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="sourceDb"/>         <xs:element ref="termId"/>         <xs:element ref="termName"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termQualifier"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termType"/>         <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="termLanguage"/>       </xs:sequence>       <xs:attribute name="weight"/>     </xs:complexType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="relationType">     <xs:simpleType>       <xs:union>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:token">             <xs:enumeration value="NT"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:token">             <xs:enumeration value="BT"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:token">             <xs:enumeration value="USE"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:token">             <xs:enumeration value="UF"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:token">             <xs:enumeration value="RT"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:token">             <xs:enumeration value="LE"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:string">             <xs:pattern value="X-.*"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>       </xs:union>     </xs:simpleType>   </xs:element>   <!-- Elements used in multiple contexts -->   <xs:element name="termId" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="termName" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="termQualifier" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="termType">     <xs:simpleType>       <xs:union>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:token">             <xs:enumeration value="PT"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:token">             <xs:enumeration value="ND"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:token">             <xs:enumeration value="NL"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>         <xs:simpleType>           <xs:restriction base="xs:string">             <xs:pattern value="X-.*"/>           </xs:restriction>         </xs:simpleType>       </xs:union>     </xs:simpleType>   </xs:element>   <xs:element name="termLanguage" type="xs:string"/>   <xs:element name="sourceDb" type="xs:anyURI"/> </xs:schema>
